snippet: MAIDMAN--Gail. "Art, in itself, is an attempt to bring order out of chaos." You turned Stephen Sondheim's quote into the Masterpiece of your own life. You were a very special soul, combining the arts with your love for people. You would secretly bring hope and better lives to men, women and children who needed your kindness. You would always say we should not do anything that we did feel proud to see on the cover of The New York Times. Mommy, your life should be on the cover of The New York Times. With all our Love, Starr (nee Haymes), Jacques & Sterling Kempin 1/3
lead_paragraph: MAIDMAN--Gail. "Art, in itself, is an attempt to bring order out of chaos." You turned Stephen Sondheim's quote into the Masterpiece of your own life. You were a very special soul, combining the arts with your love for people. You would secretly bring hope and better lives to men, women and children who needed your kindness. You would always say we should not do anything that we did feel proud to see on the cover of The New York Times. Mommy, your life should be on the cover of The New York Times. With all our Love, Starr (nee Haymes), Jacques & Sterling Kempin 1/3
